problems.title: Add Two Numbers
problems.description: Create a function that takes two integers and returns their sum.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of a and b

problems.title: Check Even or Odd
problems.description: Create a function that checks if a number is even or odd using bitwise AND.

problems.title: Function Overloading - Area
problems.description: Create overloaded functions to calculate area of square (1 parameter) and rectangle (2 parameters).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: type (1 for square, 2 for rectangle)
Second line: side (for square) or length and width (for rectangle)

problems.title: Count Set Bits
problems.description: Write a function to count the number of 1s in binary representation of a number.

sampleTestCases.explanation: 7 in binary is 111, which has 3 ones

problems.title: Array Sum Function
problems.description: Write a function that takes an array and its size, returns the sum of all elements.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Swap Using Pointers
problems.description: Write a function to swap two numbers using pointers.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b

problems.title: Power of Two Check
problems.description: Write a function using bitwise operations to check if a number is a power of 2.

problems.title: Find Maximum in Array
problems.description: Write a function that finds the maximum element in an array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
